description.value: Used to indicate extra information about a coded value e.g. Laterality, Severity, etc.

definition.value: Used to qualify or indicate extra information about a coded value e.g. Laterality, Severity, etc.
The type of qualifier used to indicate extra information about a coded value e.g. Laterality, Severity, etc.
The qualifier value used to indicate extra information about a coded value e.g. Left, Bilateral, Severe, etc.
